about_the_game:
*The official English version will update after Chinese version about 2~3 months.

Story:
Dark mansion, lightless rooms, maze-like corridor ...
At midnight, the "something" in the dark mansion will come out!
However ──
Those are not important!

The sold girl Erica is about to live with the Duke who has a very bad reputation in this terrifying mansion.
Face to the poker face Duke who can't be see through, Erica has to live the daily routine where she will die if she says something wrong in accident? !
Choose and choose, experience the full love from them!

Extremely scared girl X Poker face menswear beauty
An AVG of Lily story , stereotype but sweet story of Beauty and the Beast will be staged soon.

Character:



Erica：
The girl who was sold to the Duke by her parents. She thought she was lucky and the goal of life is try to live safely.


Louise：
The Duke, who was rumored to be very terrifying, was actually a lady in men's clothing. And she is always has no expression on face.


Maiden:
The suspicious-looking maid has unexplained hostility towards Erica.

GamePlay:
Players will read the story from the perspective of the protagonist, and reach the ending through one option after another.
This game has only one route and three endings. After one round, you can resd the story through the perspective of other characters.

PS.
*There are a little Horror and Bloody description in our game.
*There are very subtle insinuations in the story text, but our game has zero pornographic images or performance.

content_descriptors.notes: A little subtle insinuations about sexual in the story text ,images and  performance.

name: Tied by your Red

subs.option_text: 繫於妳的紅絲帶 Tied by your Red - $3.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7以上
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Can be used normally
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Can be used normally
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7以上
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Can be used normally
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Can be used normally

short_description: A story of the sold girl Erica is about to live with the Duke who has a very bad reputation in this terrifying mansion. She has to live where she will die if she says something wrong in accident? ! A Lily story, stereotype but sweet story of Beauty and the Beast will be staged soon.
